cause.description:
Christopher Baronaitis is a bright young boy, with a small moneyless pocket. He cannot afford to attend McMaster as he is..to put it bluntly..poor. Please help give your donations and send this bright young boy on his career path. And yes..he is dutch.
1. Chris is smart
2. Chris is poor
3. Chris knows Steve..who is actually dutch
cause.name: Send Chris To University
